title: BRIEF-Metro Alliance Holdings & Equities Elects Atty. Lamberto B. Mercado, Jr. As Acting Chairman
text:
BRIEF-Metro Alliance Holdings & Equities Elects Atty. Lamberto B. Mercado, Jr. As Acting Chairman

Stock Markets 38 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 10:08)

BRIEF-Metro Alliance Holdings & Equities Elects Atty. Lamberto B. Mercado, Jr. As Acting Chairman Oct 28 (Reuters) - Metro Alliance Holdings & Equities Corp

MAH.PS :

* ATTY. LAMBERTO B. MERCADO, JR. ELECTED AS ACTING CHAIRMAN
